issues.title: Sign up with email or OAuth
issues.body:
As a new user, I want to sign up using email or Google so that I can create an account and save my progress.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Email and Google auth
- User data saved in DB
- Duplicate emails are blocked

issues.title: Personalized onboarding flow
issues.body:
As a new user, I want to select preferred topics and daily goals so that I can tailor the experience.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Choose topics (Arrays, Trees...)
- Set daily goal (1–5 problems)

issues.title: View daily recommended problem
issues.body:
As a user, I want to see a daily recommended problem based on my goals so I know what to solve next.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Problem data shown
- Next problem appears after solving

issues.title: Submit my code
issues.body:
As a user, I want to submit my code so that the system can store it and evaluate my progress.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Code editor with language select
- Submission stored with result

issues.title: AI-powered code review
issues.body:
As a user, I want to receive GPT-based feedback on my code so I can improve.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- GPT API integration
- Feedback saved in DB and shown on UI

issues.title: AI-generated problem hints
issues.body:
As a user, I want to get hints if I’m stuck on a problem so I can still make progress.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Click 'Hint' returns AI hint
- Hint levels: low → high

issues.title: Track streaks and problem count
issues.body:
As a user, I want to see my streaks and total solved so I stay motivated.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Track submission dates
- Show current + longest streak

issues.title: View skill mastery heatmap
issues.body:
As a user, I want to see topic mastery so I know where to improve.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Mastery score per topic
- Display as heatmap or bar graph

issues.title: Gamified dashboard UI
issues.body:
As a user, I want a dashboard showing XP, streaks, and goals so I can stay engaged.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Dashboard layout with XP/streak widgets
- Dark mode supported

issues.title: Deploy MVP to Vercel/Railway
issues.body:
As a developer, I want to deploy the MVP publicly so users can access it.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Deployment on Vercel or Railway
- Secure environment variables

issues.title: Implement Prisma schema
issues.body:
As a backend dev, I want to create a DB schema to persist users, problems, and attempts.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Models: User, Problem, Attempt, Feedback, AIHint
- Prisma migration runs successfully

issues.title: Integrate OpenAI GPT-4 for feedback
issues.body:
As a system, I want to use OpenAI to generate code reviews so users get smart coaching.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Input: code + problem context
- Output: feedback text
- Error handling in place

issues.title: Load problems from static JSON
issues.body:
As a dev, I want to use static JSON files for problems so I can skip LeetCode API for MVP.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- JSON with problem data (title, topic, diff)
- Used by recommender engine
